title: Conor McGregor 'investigated over second sexual assault as woman says he attacked her by Dublin pub'
text:
Conor McGregor is under investigation for a second sexual assault in less than a year.

A woman in her 20s was allegedly attacked in a car parked by a Dublin pub last week.

The MMA fighter, 31, has not been charged and police are yet to interview him about the allegation.

Conor McGregor is under investigation for a second sexual assault in less than a year

McGregor, who has a long-term girlfriend, Dee Devlin, is already under investigation for another assault which took place in a hotel in December.

He is still waiting to hear if he will be charged with that case after the police passed on their findings to the prosecutor's office earlier this year.

A publicist for McGregor told The New York Times: 'Conor McGregor is frequently the subject of rumours.

'He emphatically denies any report accusing him of sexual assault.'

The fighter announced his retirement in March this year, just hours before the allegations about the first alleged assault became known.

Despite being arguably his sport's biggest name, McGregor has had a number of run-ins with police in recent years.

He appeared in court just last week after being charged with assaulting an elderly man in a pub in April.

McGregor, who has a long-term girlfriend, Dee Devlin, is already under investigation for another assault which took place in a hotel in December

And earlier this year, he settled a case following accusations he smashed the phone of someone filming him outside a hotel in Miami.

Last year, he avoided jail after throwing a metal cart at a bus carrying fellow fighter Khabib Nurmagomedov following a press conference, injuring two with shattered glass.

In Ireland, McGregor has not been named over the sexual assault charges due to laws restricting identifying people charged with rape until they have been convicted.

He has only been described as a 'famous Irish sports star' in reports.

A lawyer has not yet responded to a request for comment.
description: Conor McGregor is under investigation for a second sexual assault in less than a year after a woman in her 20s was allegedly attacked in a car parked by a Dublin pub last week.
